description: List of software dependencies required by the asset or app. Each item must be an object specifying at least 'name', and may include other fields such as 'package_manager', 'version', 'stages', 'url', 'tag', 'destdir', 'build_commands'.

package_manager.description: The package manager to use for installing the dependency.

version.description: Specific version of the package to install (optional).

stages.description: Stages in which the dependency is required (e.g., ['work']).

url.description: URL to fetch the dependency from (used for git or other sources).

tag.description: Tag or branch to use when fetching from a VCS (e.g., git).

destdir.description: Destination directory for installing the dependency.

build_commands.description: Commands to run to build/install the dependency after fetching.
